entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
